top10_new_or_updated.description: CDHI Core Digital Women's Health members Davinny Sou, and Marinja Principe participated in the winter school “GenDeCT - Sex- and Gender-sensitive inclusive design of clinical trials” at Universität Bielefeld. top10_new_or_updated.description: Nadja Ging-Jehli, PhD (Core Director for Adaptive Intelligence and Mental Health Mechanisms at CDHI) gave an invited talk at the Joint International Conference on Serious Games, where she introduced her new platform, Gearshift Fellowship. items.title: UMZH Precision Digital Therapeutics Summer School, 17-21 August 2026, Zurich
items.description: What are Precision Digital Therapeutics (PDTx)? How are PDTx designed, evaluated, implemented, scaled, and reimbursed? How can Generative AI make PDTx highly personalized? Digital Therapeutics (DTx) are software-based interventions to manage and treat disease. Precision DTx (PDTx) deliver hyper-personalized interventions at the most relevant and opportune moment [...]

Qiuhan “Jo” Jin, Alexandre de MONTLEAU, Vassilka Kavassakali, Sara Tarrés Parra- recently hosted three workshops with around 60 participants across Switzerland and Germany. items.title: Join our Digital Women’s Health CORE at the Women’s Wellbeing at Work Summit
items.description: Please join Vassilka Kavassakali, Davinny Sou, and Prof. Dr. Marcia Nißen at the Women's Wellbeing at Work Summit on November 14th, 2025, at the HWZ Hochschule für Wirtschaft Zürich.
